snippet: Recent excavations have uncovered fragments indicating that the terracotta head in question was illicitly removed in the 1970s from a site of a sanctuary of Demeter.
abstract: Recent excavations have uncovered fragments indicating that the terracotta head in question was illicitly removed in the 1970s from a site of a sanctuary of Demeter.

headline.main: Getty to Return Ancient Artifact to Sicily
headline.print_headline: Getty Decides to Return Ancient Artifact to Sicily
